column5: There is only one thing I do on this day   Had a fish fry last night, so after a wee sleep in , off we go to meet some friends at the fishin hole.  Fewer fish after all the rain, but a more varied catch today.    This Bowfin lit up for us.  A great day on the water.
Great catches, how did that mean Bowfin fight?    Thanks for sharing, MTBF
They fight a lot harder than a pike
nice way to spend fathers day!  Cheers!
